summary: BuildRequest contains no stated requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff introduces several new authentication/onboarding-related components and UI changes; since nothing was requested, these changes appear to be unrequested features relative to the provided BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced an AuthContext/AuthProvider that tracks a "main user" principal in localStorage and exposes main-user/authenticated state and controls.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest; this is new functionality added by the diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified app gating so WelcomeScreen and OnboardingScreen are shown only when the user is the authenticated "main user".
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest; this gating behavior is newly implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Enhanced TopNav with authentication UI (login/logout), main-user identification, and main-user-only edit controls (e.g., Edit Content, Edit Name modal triggers).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest; these navigation/auth changes are newly implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated App routing setup to use OnboardingGate as the root route component and wrapped the app with InternetIdentityProvider and ThemeProvider.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest; these structural changes are newly introduced/modified.
